title: The Morgan experience
creator_credit: PP Video Productions, Castrol and Lindsay Porter
brief_description: Brian Weeks has been driving and filming Morgans for over 25 years. This video is the result of this experience and covers a broad range of areas such as; footage from Morgans in action at Le Mans, the evolution and construction of the vehicles, associated motor clubs, buying, maintaining and restoring, 3 wheeler Morgans, Morgans in the United States, interviews with Peter and Charles Morgan, plus much more.
